segments.text: Peter , listen to the lyrics of this song .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's so special about this song ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's from the musical that is so popular in New York right now . Do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not very much . It sounds too emotional to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's why it is so popular . It was recorded by Barbara Tutin . I've heard that when she sang this song on stage the opening night , she created quite a sensation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid my association with Broadway musicals is rather limited .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , you need an introduction . The school drama club is putting on a musical production . How about going together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a better idea . Let's go to a jazz concert and I'll give you an education in jazz .
segments.speaker: S2
